CustomField.description: This field defines the default EMPAUA user that signs Docusign contracts sent out from this Opportunity. Filled by Process Builder. ID of this lookup is referenced here: DeliveringEntityContractSignerAuto__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field defines the default EMPAUA user that signs Docusign contracts sent out from this Opportunity.
CustomField.label: EMPAUA Signer SoW
